str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Optative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make straight, (b) met: I put in the right way, direct. From kata and euthuno; to straighten fully, i.e. direct.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Endurance, steadfastness, patient waiting for. From hupomeno; cheerful endurance, constancy.
